prompt: In the developing countries, more than  $$\underline{}$$  people die from hunger every year.

句意：在发展中国家，每年有1000多万人死于饥饿。

考查动词辨析。million等大数有基数词修饰需用单数形式，和of连用表盖指则用复数形式，即millions of成千上万的。根据句意语法，可知选C。

prompt: They worked for  $$\underline{}$$  days, and finished the  $$\underline{}$$  task successfully.

prompt:

B.October thirty-first
C.July twentieth-seventh

prompt: Which of the following numbers is right?
answer_option:
A.two million three hundred and fourty-nine
B.nine hundred and thirty four
C.fifty-two hundred and sixty-seven
D.one thousand, two hundred and ninety-six
analysis: 考查数字的读法。句意：下列哪个数字是正确的？4个选项数字分别是A.2，000，349；B.934；C.5267；D.1，296。A选项 fourty-nine拼写错误，应该是 " forty-nine" ，排除；B选项thirty four表达错误，十位数和个位数之间要用连字符号，排除；C选项表达错误，千位以上的数字表达，从数字的右端向左端数起，每三位数加一个逗号 "，" ，从右开始，第一个 "，" 前面的数字读thousand，不能以hundred为单位划分；D选项单位划分正确，百位数与十位数之间有and连接，十位数和个位数之间有连字符号，单词拼写正确。故选D。

prompt: Claire's bees fly 80, 000 kilometers and visit about three $$\underline{}$$ flowers to make a kilo of honey. She hopes to keep $$\underline{}$$ of bees.
answer_option:
A.million; million
B.millions; millions
C.million; millions
D.millions; million
analysis: 考查数词。million为数词，意为“百万”，前面有具体的数字修饰时不用变复数，millions of为固定短语，意为“成千上万，无数”。句意：克莱尔的蜜蜂要飞行8万公里，采300万朵花才能生产一公斤蜂蜜。她希望能养数百万只蜜蜂。故选C项。

prompt: In the factory, there are 200 girls. About $$\underline{}$$ of workers are girls. So fifty workers are boys.
answer_option:
A.three quarter
B.three quarters

analysis: 考查分数表达法。句意：工厂里有200名女工。大约四分之三的工人是女孩。50个工人是男孩。分数由基数词和序数词构成，分子用基数词，分母用序数词，分子超过 "1" 时，分母用复数，C项three和four都是基数词，可排除。quarter是可数名词，表示1/4；three需接复数名词，quarter需用复数形式。故答案为B。
knowledge_tree: 词法-数词-基序混用-小数、分数和百分数

prompt:

prompt: I think $$\underline{}$$ of the materials I listen to at the beginning of the exam $$\underline{}$$ easy.

prompt: There are more than $$\underline{}$$ students studying in this school.
answer_option:
A.thousand of

analysis: 考查概数词的用法。句意：这所学校有两千多名学生。two thousand两千；thousands of成千上万。根据句中 "more than" 可知，此处是 "学校的人数超过了某一个具体数字" ，应使用具体的数字，所以此处使用two thousand，表示 "两千" 。故选B。

prompt:

prompt:

prompt:

prompt: The real reason why the price of the pork  $$\underline{}$$ , and still is, too high is mixed, and no short discussion can explain this problem.

prompt: I $$\underline{}$$ Australia with my family twice, but I still want to travel there again.

D.other thing
analysis: 句意：——鱼肉、土豆、橘子……嗯，你还想让我给你买什么？——什么也不用买。谢谢，妈妈。else其他的；other其他的，形容词，修饰名词；else things形式错误，else不作前置定语；other thing形式错误，thing应用复数。else常放在疑问词的后面，故应选A。
knowledge_tree: 词法-形容词和副词-形容词和副词辨析

prompt: We used the link method $$\underline{}$$ we could remember these words easily.
answer_option:
A.now that
B.as soon as
C.so that
D.as long as
analysis: 句意：我们使用联系的方法，以便我们可以很容易地记住这些单词。考查连词辨析。now that既然，引导原因状语从句；as soon as意思是“一……就……”，引导时间状语从句；so that意思是“以便于”，引导目的状语从句；as long as只要，引导条件状语从句。根据句意可知，我们使用联系的方法目的是为了很容易地记住这些单词，所以用so that引导目的状语从句，故答案选C。

prompt: Look, the building over there is the landmark of our city. It is $$\underline{}$$ high.
answer_option:
A.fifty-five metre
B.fifty-five metres
C.fifty-five-metre
D.fifty five metres
analysis: 句意：看，那里的这个建筑物是我们城市的地标。它有55米高。考查表语以及数词表达。fifty-five metre形式错误，应改为fifty-five metres；fifty-five metres 55米，作表语；fifty-five-metre 55米高的，作定语；fifty five metres形式错误，应改为fifty-five metres。C项只能作定语，可用于it is a fifty-five-metre high building。fifty-five metres译为“55米高”，用于“数词+单位名词+tall/ high”等结构。故选B。
knowledge_tree: 基础知识-中考常用短语与句型

prompt:
— $$\underline{}$$ your school life $$\underline{}$$ ?

— It's busy and interesting. School is really full of fun.
answer_option: A.What does; like
B.What is; like
C.How does; like
D.How is; like
analysis: 考查固定句型。根据What's ....like?....怎么样？相同用法有What do/does...look like?=How do/does...look?。故答案选B。

prompt: Which of the following is correct?
answer_option:
A.The meeting is of great important.
B.The teachers did what they could help the boy.
C.This kind of chemical is environmentally disastrous.
analysis: 考查句法结构。题干意：下列哪个选项是正确的？A项，根据所给句结构，可联想到固定结构 "be+of+抽象名词" ，而句尾为形容词important，不符合结构，因此A项错误；B项，根据所给句结构可知，句中有两个谓语动词did和help，不符合基本结构，因此B项错误；C项， "这种化学物质对环境是灾难性的。" 副词environmentally修饰形容词disastrous，结构正确。故选：C。

prompt: Don't all speak at once! $$\underline{}$$ , please.
answer_option:
A.Each at one time
B.One by one time
C.One at a time
D.One for each time
analysis: 考查副词短语。at one time表示 "同时" ；one by one表示 "一个接一个" ；at a time表示 "一次，每次" ；each time表示 "每次，每当" 。根据句意，可知是让大家不要一起说，要轮流说，所以排除A；B选项one by one表示 "一个接一个" ，但在其后再加time却无此用法，故排除；D选项的意思是 "每次都是同一个人说" ，不符合句意，也排除；C选项表示 "每次一个人说" ，符合句意。句意：别一下子全都说！请一次一个说。故选C。

prompt: You'd better wait for $$\underline{}$$ . He has something important to do now.
answer_option:
A.sometime
B.sometimes
C.some times
D.some time
analysis: 句意：你最好等一会儿。他现在有重要的事情要做。some time某个时候；sometimes 有时；some times几次；some time一段时间。根据 "He has something important to do now." 他现在有重要的事情要做。可知，你最好等一会儿。因此选择 some time一段时间。符合语境。故选 D。

prompt: She was $$\underline{}$$ a bad mood and had nobody $$\underline{}$$ .
answer_option:
A.in; to talk
B.on; to talk
C.on; to talk to
D.in; to talk to
analysis: 考查固定短语。根据语境，她心情不好，没有人可交谈。in a good/bad mood 心情好/不好；talk to sb 与某人交谈。故答案选D。

prompt: Businessmen prefer $$\underline{}$$ e-mails to communicate with each other rather than $$\underline{}$$ phone calls.
answer_option:
A.write; make
B.to write; make
C.to write; to make
D.write; to make
analysis: 句意：商人喜欢写电子邮件来互相交流，而不是打电话。prefer to do sth. rather than do sth.表示宁愿……而不愿……，故选：B。
knowledge_tree: 基础知识-中考常用短语与句型-表“宁愿”句型

prompt: We can use the computer $$\underline{}$$ our homework.
answer_option:
A.do
B.to do
C.doing
D.does
analysis: 本题考查use…to do sth.的固定搭配。该短语意为 "使用……做某事" ，故答案为B.

prompt: $$\underline{}$$ I haven't seen the film , I can't tell what I think of it.
answer_option: A.As
B.Because
C.For
D.When
analysis: 此题考查连词，根据题目逻辑关系可知前后句子是因果关系，as意为“因此”是因果关系连词，故选A。

prompt: She was a woman of $$\underline{}$$ talent and determination.
answer_option: A.useful
B.helpful
C.wonderful
D.unusual
analysis: 考查形容词。Unique,独特的。和D. unusual，不同寻常的，为同义词。A. useful，有用的。B. helpful，有帮助的。C. wonderful，完美的。

prompt:
—What kind of house would you like? 

—I'd like $$\underline{}$$ with a garden in front of $$\underline{}$$ .
answer_option:
A.it; one
B.one; one
C.one; it
D.it; it
analysis: 句意：——你想要什么种类的房子？——我想要一个在它前面有花园的。第一空是代指house，所以用不定代词one；第二空是指想要的那个房子，所以用it，故选C。

prompt: She is new here, so she has $$\underline{}$$ friends at school.
answer_option:
A.much
B.few
C.little
D.a little
analysis: 考查形容词词义辨析。句意，她是新来的，所以她在学校几乎没有朋友。much许多，用来修饰不可数名词；few几乎没有，修饰可数名词复数；little，a little修饰不可数名词，little带有否定含义，而a little则是肯定。根据题干She is new here，她是新来的。可知是她在学校几乎没有朋友。故选B。
knowledge_tree: 词法-形容词和副词-形容词和副词辨析

prompt: The horse is getting old and can't run $$\underline{}$$ it did.
answer_option:
A.as faster as
B.so fast than
C.faster
D.so fast as
analysis: 考查同级比较。句意：这匹马越来越老，无法和以前跑得一样快了。as... as...引出的是同级比较，其中的形容词或副词不能用比较级形式，其否定式多用not so... as...。故选D。

prompt: I wonder when they $$\underline{}$$ for Beijing. I will go to the train station to see them off when they $$\underline{}$$ .
answer_option:
A.will leave; leave
B.leave; will leave
C.will go; leave
D.go; leave
analysis:
【方法一】考查宾语从句及时间状语从句。第一空为宾语从句，从句动作尚未发生，用一般将来时。第二空时间状语从句遵循 "主将从现" 原则，从句用一般现在时。故选A。

【方法二】A．根据I wonder when they $$\underline{       }$$ for Beijing．可知句子是一个宾语从句，第一句考查宾语从句的时态，当主句是一般现在时，从句时太不受主句限制，根据语境此处用一般将来时；第二句是考查when引导的时间状语从句，遵循主将从现的原则，根据句意及分析，故选B。

prompt:
—Sir, would you mind $$\underline{}$$ the window, please? 

—Of course not.
answer_option: A.opening
B.open
C.to open
D.opened
analysis: 考查动词搭配。此处为mind doing sth，所以后面的动词需要用动词ing形式。

prompt: She always does her homework $$\underline{}$$ than her brother.
answer_option:
A.more careful
B.more carefully
C.careful
D.carefully
analysis: 句意：她总是比她的弟弟做作业认真。根据 than her brother可知是比较级句型；“认真”修饰“做”，应该用副词修饰动词，故选B。
knowledge_tree: 词法-形容词和副词-形容词和副词常用短语及句型

prompt: I finished $$\underline{}$$ my homework and then I had a rest.
answer_option: A.do
B.doing
C.does
D.did
analysis: 考查非谓语。finish doing意为 "做完某事" 。因此选择B。
knowledge_tree: 词法-非谓语动词-动名词-动名词作宾语-v+doing

prompt:
There $$\underline{}$$ a tree and some flowers near my
house.
answer_option: A.am
B.are
C.is
D.be
analysis: 此题考查主谓一致，there be句型中遵循 "就近原则" ，a tree为单数，故谓语动词用单数第三人称形式，故选C。

prompt: She sits between $$\underline{}$$ .
answer_option: A.I and he
B.me and him
C.he and I
D.him and me
analysis: 考查人称代词。根据between介词后加人称代词宾格。又，人称代词单数顺序：第二人称、第三人称、第一人称。故答案选D。

prompt: I $$\underline{}$$ and became a chess club member.
answer_option: A.took part in
B.joined in
C.attended to
D.signed up
analysis: 考查短语。句意为“我报名了棋艺社并成为了其中一员”。A、B项意为“参加”，C项意为“注意；倾听”，D项意为“报名”，与划线部分同义，故选D。
knowledge_tree: 基础知识-词汇-同近义词

prompt: He has two sons, $$\underline{}$$ work as chemists.
answer_option:
A.two of whom
B.both of whom
C.both of which
D.all of whom

prompt: There are $$\underline{}$$ visitors to the wetland park, and the number is becoming $$\underline{}$$ now.
answer_option:
A.thousand of; larger and larger
B.thousands of; more and more
C.thousands of; larger and larger
D.thousand of; more and more
analysis: 句意：——成千上万的游客来到湿地公园， 游客数目现在正变得越来越大。 thousands of成千上万，表示约数； 数目大小用small和large来表示。所以选C。

prompt:
—  $$\underline{}$$ .

— Yes, please. I want a pair of socks for sports.
answer_option:
A.What do you like?
B.How do you do?
C.Can I help you?
D.How much are the socks?
analysis: 考查疑问句。句意：——我有什么能帮你的吗？——好的，请。我想要一双运动袜。A.你喜欢什么？B.你好。C.我有什么能帮你的吗？D.袜子多少钱？根据答语 "我想要一双运动袜" ，可知此处应当是售货员问顾客 "我有什么能帮你的吗？" ，故选C。

prompt: My friend would like a flat $$\underline{}$$ a larger balcony.
answer_option:
A.at
B.in
C.with
D.for
analysis: 本题考查介词的用法。句意：我的朋友喜欢带有一个大阳台的公寓，这里的with表示伴随，有，a flat with a larger balcony：带有大阳台的公寓。故选C。

prompt:
—Does Ted tell you if he $$\underline{}$$ next Sunday? 

—No, he doesn't. But if he $$\underline{}$$ , I will give you a ring.
answer_option:
A.will come; will come
B.will come; comes
C.comes; comes
analysis: 考查一般将来时和一般现在时表示一般将来时。句意：—Ted有没有告诉你他下星期天是否会来？—不，他没有。但是如果他来的话，我会给你打电话的。第一空中if引导的是宾语从句，根据空格后 "next Sunday" 可知时态用一般将来时；第二空中if引导条件状语从句，从句时态用一般现在表将来的动作，B项符合语境。故答案为：B。

prompt: This beautiful dress $$\underline{}$$ silk and it $$\underline{}$$ very comfortable.
answer_option:
A.is made of; feels
B.is made from; feels
C.is made from; is felt
D.is made of; is felt
analysis: be made of 和 be made from 均表由……制成，不同的是be made of能看出原材料，be made from 看不出原材料；feel 是系动词，表摸起来，无被动语态。故选：A。

prompt:
— Hurry up! There's a bus coming.

— Take it easy! There will be $$\underline{}$$ one just in five minutes.
answer_option: A.other
B.the other
C.another
D.any other
analysis: 考查代词。句意： "快点，有一辆公交来了" ， "别紧张，五分钟之后会来另一辆" ，another 指三者及三者以上的一个.故答案选C。

prompt:
——I'm sorry. I'm late for the film.

—— $$\underline{}$$  . There is still a little time.
answer_option:
A.Bad luck.
B.That's right.
C.Never mind.
D.All right.
analysis: 考查情景交际。句意：——很抱歉，电影我迟到了。——没关系，还有一点时间。A项意为运气不好，B项意为对，C项意为没关系，D项意为好吧。前句表示道歉，因此回答没关系。故选C。

prompt: There $$\underline{        }$$ a birthday party for the teacher tomorrow.
answer_option:
A.have
B.are having
C.had
D.is going to be
analysis: 句意：明天将为老师举行生日聚会。考查there be 句型。结合There可知，此处是there be结构，不能与have混用，排除A/B/C选项，句中的时间是 "tomorrow" ，句子应用一般将来时，故选D。

prompt:
Tom became interested in books at a very young age. He read every book he could find and bought books of all kinds. Today Tom has a big collection of books. His favourite books are mystery novels and books about detective stories. 

The story mainly tells us $$\underline{}$$ .
answer_option:
A.why Tom does the reading
B.how Tom learned to read
C.how much Tom likes to read
D.what Tom's favourite books are
analysis: 考查段落大意。句意：这个故事主要告诉我们汤姆有多喜欢读书。又根据文中 "He read every book he could find and bought books of all kinds. Today Tom has a big collection of books.（他读了他能找到的每一本书，并买了所有的书种类，今天汤姆收藏了大量的书）" 可知，这个故事主要讲述了汤姆对读书的热爱，所以本空应填how much Tom likes to read。故选：C。
knowledge_tree: 阅读理解-选择型阅读理解

prompt: What did the author do in the last three hours of the camel ride?
answer_option:
A.She learned something about camels.
B.She carried warm clothes and a sleeping bag.
C.She was so worried that she walked again.
D.She felt relaxed and sat peacefully.
analysis:
细节理解题。题干关键词为 in the last three hours，根据文章中第三段第三句：…by hour three I had found a rhyhm and I could relax and sit peacefully，可知作者后面三个小时都很放松，很平静地坐着，故答案为 D。

【错因分析】根据文章中第一段第五句：In the morning, we learned all about camels and their habits，可知是出发前的早上，“我们”学习了关于骆驼的习性，而不是最后三个小时，故 A 项错误。根据文章中第一段最后一句：We Ieft after lunch, carrying packs with our warm clothes and sleeping bags tucked inside，可知是午饭后“我们”携带好装着暖和衣服与睡袋的包裹，故 B 项错误。根据文章中第三段第一、二句：…by the end of the first hour I was worried. I wondered whether I would ever walk again，可知第一个小时末，“我”很担忧，不知是否能够再次步行，但是“我”没有步行，故 C 项错误。

prompt: According to the passage, which one is true?
answer_option:
A.I have two nieces who are in the same age.
B.One of my nieces want to be a famous make-up artist.
C.Both teenagers in the passage cannot get along well with others.
D.I feel terrible because I may have hurt my sister-in-law's feelings.
analysis:
细节理解题。根据文章中第三段最后一句：I felt so terrible because l was rude to my secret Santa，可知“我”感觉很糟糕，因为“我”对“我”的秘密圣诞老人很不礼貌。通过上文可知“我”的秘密圣诞老人是“我”的嫂子，“我”的不礼貌的行为可能会伤害到她的情感，故答案为 D。

【错因分析】根据文章中第二段第一句：…when I was babysitting my nieces, who are aged 8 and 10，可知“我”的两个侄女一个8岁一个10岁，故 A 项错误。B 项文章中未提及。文章中只描述了两个青年的尴尬时刻，并不能表示他们无法与他人相处融洽，为过度推断，故 C 项错误。

prompt: Why does the writer say "$$\underline{}$$"?
answer_option:
A.He is scared by the noise.
B.He is jumping very high.
C.He is shocked by the sound of the trumpet.
D.He is so excited.
analysis: 推理判断题。根据文中第五段第四句：We spent a long time making rude noises at each other … 和第六段第一句：I blew a rude noise and my trumpet roared，可知作者经过老师的指导和练习，终于将小号吹响了，由此推测他此刻心情应该十分高兴和激动，故答案为D。

prompt: There is $$\underline{}$$ "r" and $$\underline{}$$ "u" in the word "run" .
answer_option: A.an; an
B.an; a
C.a; a
D.a; an
analysis: 考查冠词。根据用法, 以元音发音的单词前用an,以辅音发音的单词前用a, 又因为r为元音发音, 故用an, u为辅音发音, 故用a, 故答案选B。

prompt: What is TRUE about Yifan?
answer_option:
A.She is a very talented chess player.
B.She is very old to begin playing chess.
C.She is a weak player as a child.
D.She doesn't like school studies at all.
analysis:
细节理解题。根据文章中第二段第五句：Her special talent was obvious to everyone, and she was soon able to play in youth tournaments，可知侯逸凡的特殊天赋是显而易见的，这也让她很快就能参加青年锦标赛，故答案为 A。

【错因分析】根据文章中第二段第一句： Yifan started playing chess as a hobby when she was only three years old，可知侯逸凡三岁就开始下国际象棋了，故 B 项错误。侯逸凡从小就很有天赋，所以她小时候并不是一个弱者，故 C 项错误。根据文章中第三段第三句：She has to do her school studies while she is traveling and, in addition to the chess, she is a good student who hopes to go to university one day，可知侯逸凡在世界各地比赛时，也会完成自己的学习任务，她是一个希望有朝一日能上大学的好学生，故 D 项错误。

prompt: What was difficult for the author?
answer_option:
A.Making a sound with the trumpet.
B.Making a rude noise.
C.Pushing the buttons.
D.Changing to the guitar class.
analysis: 细节理解题。根据文章中第三段第二句：No matter how much I blew, I couldn't get a sound out of it，可知把小号吹响对于作者来说很困难，故答案为A。

prompt: Which of the following best describes the family's attitudes towards what happened in the shop that day?
answer_option:
A.They look back on what happened in anger.
B.They feel what happened was amusing.
C.They feel that William is not responsible.
D.They are very grateful to the policeman for his help.
analysis:
推理判断题。题干关键词为 the family's attitudes。根据文章中第五段： My visit to Hamley's is a family joke now ...， 可知威廉的玩具店之旅现在已经成了一个家庭笑话，由此可以推测威廉的家人们觉得那天发生的事很有趣。joke 和 amusing 为同义替换，故答案为 B。

【错因分析】根据文章中第五段：... and the trouble I got into after we got home， 可知威廉回家后陷入了麻烦，可以推测家人们很生气，但这是玩具店之旅当天的感受，而不是 look back on（回顾）后的感受， 故 A 项错误。C、D 项原文未提及，切忌主观臆断，故 C、D 项错误。

prompt: How many students chose to learn the trumpet?
answer_option:
A.Two.
B.Four.
C.Six.
D.Seven.
analysis: 细节理解题。根据文章中第二段第一句：Six of us chose trumpet lessons and the rest of the class chose the guitar, the flute or the piano，可知六位学生选择上小号课，故答案为C。

prompt:
The poster says Basketball Computer Game $$\underline{}$$ . $#table{|$$\centerline{FOR SALE}centerlineendflag
$$\centerline{Basketball Computer Game}centerlineendflag
$$\centerline{2-4 players}centerlineendflag
$$\centerline{Bought last month}centerlineendflag
$$\centerline{Played once-works perfectly}centerlineendflag
$$\centerline{Phone Jack: 3665444}centerlineendflag|}#$
answer_option:
A.is designed by Jack
B.is only suitable for younger players
C.is almost new and in good condition

prompt: What is the writer's main purpose of writing this passage?

prompt:
— What was the result?

— They were  $$\underline{}$$  when they passed the ball, so they lost to the other team.
answer_option:
A.careless
B.careful
C.patient
D.active
analysis:
句意：—结果如何？—他们传球时不小心，所以输给了另一个队。
考查形容词。careless粗心的，不小心的；careful仔细的；patient有耐心的；active积极的。根据后面的句子“they lost to the other team”，以及提供的选项，可推测整个的句子应该是因为传球不小心（careless），所以输给了另一队。故选A。

prompt: Helen is watching a basketball match which is shown  $$\underline{}$$  on TV. Though he is not on the scene, he can still cheer for his team.
answer_option:
A.lively
B.live
C.living
D.alive
analysis:
句意：海伦正在看一场电视直播的篮球赛，虽然没有在现场，但是仍然可以为他的球队加油。

考查形容词辨析。lively活泼的，活跃的，充满生气的；live活着的，实况转播的；living活着的，尚在人间的；alive活着的。根据句意，因为海伦没有在现场，所以只能看电视直播，所以用live。故选B。

prompt: We wanted to  $$\underline{}$$  /wɔːk/ to the mountain top.
answer_option:
A.week
B.walk
C.wake
D.wait
analysis: walk n./v. 行走；步行。句意：我们想步行上山。

prompt: It's very kind $$\underline{}$$ you to lend me your reusable shopping bags.
answer_option:
A.of
B.for
C.to
D.with
analysis: 本题考查介词辨析。句意：你把你的可以重复使用的购物袋借给我真是太好了。根据 "It's+adj.+of sb.+to do sth." 的句式结构可知答案为A。

prompt:
— I hear people can pay for almost everything by ZHI FU BAO in China.

— Actually. It's  $$\underline{}$$  that people often go shopping without taking any paper money.
answer_option:
A.important
B.impossible
C.surprising
D.necessary
analysis: 句意： —— 我听说在中国，人们几乎可以用支付宝支付一切费用。 —— 的确。这是令人惊讶的，人们经常不带纸币去购物。A. important重要的；B. impossible不可能的；C. surprising令人惊讶的；D. necessary有必要的。根据下文people often go shopping without taking any paper money可知这里是说吃惊的。根据题意，故选C。

prompt:
— Mom, I was the first to reach the top of the mountain.

— Good job, Jack! I'm  $$\underline{}$$  of you.
answer_option:
A.careful
B.proud
C.tired
D.afraid
analysis: 考查固定短语。根据上句“I was the first to reach the top of the mountain”可知母亲为儿子感到骄傲。be proud of为……感到骄傲。所以选B项。
knowledge_tree: 词法-形容词和副词-形容词和副词辨析

prompt:
—  $$\underline{}$$  is the office building?

— It's between the sports hall and the science building.
answer_option:
A.Where
B.How
C.What
D.Why
analysis: 考查疑问词。句意：——办公楼在哪里？——它在体育馆和科学楼之间。A. Where（在哪里，问地点）；B. How（怎样，问方式）；C. What（什么，问主语或宾语）；D. Why（为什么，问原因）；根据答语It's between the sports hall and the science building.“它在体育馆和科学楼之间”，判断是对“地点”提问，故选A。
